org.midica.config

Class KeyBinding

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.midica.config.KeyBinding
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<KeyBinding>

    public class KeyBinding
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<KeyBinding>

    This class represents a key binding, consisting of a key code and modifiers like SHIFT, CTRL and so on.

    Author:
    Jan Trukenm√ºller

      private int modifiers 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      KeyBinding(int code, int mods)
      Creates a new key binding.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int compareTo(KeyBinding o) 
      java.lang.String getDescription()
      Returns a human-readable description of the key binding.
      int getKeyCode()
      Returns the key code.
      int getModifiers()
      Returns a value representing the pressed modifiers (SHIFT, CTRL, and so on), connected with bitwise-OR.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a string containing the key code and the modifiers.

    • Constructor Detail

      • KeyBinding

        public KeyBinding(int code,
                  int mods)

        Creates a new key binding.

        Parameters:
        code - key code
        mods - modifiers like SHIFT, CTRL, and so on, connected with bitwise-OR

    • Method Detail

      • getKeyCode

        public int getKeyCode()

        Returns the key code.

        Returns:
        key code

      • getModifiers

        public int getModifiers()

        Returns a value representing the pressed modifiers (SHIFT, CTRL, and so on), connected with bitwise-OR.

        Returns:
        modifiers

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()

        Returns a string containing the key code and the modifiers. Each key binding with the same combination of keycode and modifiers returns the same string.

        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • getDescription

        public java.lang.String getDescription()

        Returns a human-readable description of the key binding.

        Returns:
        key-binding description.

        public int compareTo(KeyBinding o)
        Specified by:
